abstract: Turkey initiates its first in series of planned airstrikes against Islamic State along Syrian border; operations begin after United States criticizes Turkey for not participating more directly in American-led international campaign against militant group.
lead_paragraph: Turkish fighter jets carried out operations against Islamic State targets in Syria late Friday, as part of the United States-led coalition to fight the group, the Foreign Ministry said.

headline.main: Turkey Launches Its First Airstrikes of ISIS Campaign
headline.print_headline: Turkey Launches Its First Airstrikes of ISIS Campaign

snippet: Turkish fighter jets carried out operations against Islamic State targets in Syria late Friday, as part of the United States-led coalition to fight the group, the Foreign Ministry said.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
